Trade/Device Name(s): ARCHITECT C-Peptide Controls (Low, Medium and High)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ARCHITECT C-Peptide Calibrators and Controls for quantitative C-peptide measurement using the ARCHITECT i System.
Indications for Use Summary: ARCHITECT C-Peptide Calibrators are for calibration and ARCHITECT C-Peptide Controls for test precision and analytical deviation detection of the ARCHITECT i System for quantitative determination of C-peptide in human serum, plasma, and urine.
